thread.section_title: Holiday Inn Express New York City - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Good base
thread.title_full: Good base - Review of Holiday Inn Express New York City, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: Josie_Jo
title: Good base
text: We opted for this hotel as it had larger rooms and was a little further out reflected by the price. The hotel is a good base for a trip to New York. There are restaurants and a couple of bars near to it and a McDonald's. we used McDonald's for a quick and reasonable breakfast option. We walked everywhere from the hotel with Times Sq probably a 15-20 min walk away. Central Park is a very short walk from the hotel. The hotel is a little dated but the amenities are what you need and I would definitely stay here again for lower price option in New York.
